TopicTitle: Landing Struts Explode when docking / undocking rover from cargo bay

Articles.Content:
Hey !

I've recently been building a cargo rocket designed to land vertically then drop to a horisontal position (for deploying and retrieving rovers), however i'm experiencing an issue with the LT-2 Landing Strut. Whenever I dock or undock the rover, All eight struts maintaining the rocket off the ground in a horisontal position explode similtaniously.

Oddly this is not the case for landing gear, which work as intended (despite having a lower tolerance)

Does anyone have any idaes ?

The only mod i use is tweakscale (In this case, I make both the cargo bay and the landing strut larger so they can fit my rover).

 

Edit : I have also noticed the entire ship "jumps" during docking and undocking of the rover, which is incredibly strange.

 

Edited September 5, 2018 by jman6495
I noticed this problem happens whenever a kerbal is on the vessel. If you try to do the same without any on board kerbal , the explosion doesn't happen. I hope it help
